title: FS: T206 Egan Printing Error - Offers Welcome!!!
author: Danny Smith

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Egan Printing Error - Offers Welcome!!!
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Egan printing error. As can be seen in the scans there is no red on "Cincinnati" on the jersey. I have provided a correct version for comparison.

The card is not 100% missing red ink, it just missed the mark when printing "Cincinnati" on the jersey. There are a few red pixels within the white letters, but the majority (which is a little bit of red) are in the blue jersey and can be seen under a loupe.

The card has creasing and paper loss on the back. 

I am asking $300 OBO.

Please email me at [url]smithvintagecards@gmail.com[/url] with interest or questions. No PMs please.

Danny

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=86314&d=1359844210[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=86315&d=1359844224[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=86316&d=1359844235[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=86317&d=1359844248[/IMG]

if no one replies, you should post it on ebay for 5,000 dollars and see if anyone bids on it there. lol.

i might be interested but not at 400.

kevin

Offers are always welcome! Who knows, I may accept it!,

Thanks again for the responses.

Danny

Thats awesome!!

It was one of the first ones that popped up on google!!
